description: Implement dependency resolver to build execution DAG from workflow steps and identify parallel execution groups

inputs: Parsed workflow steps with depends_on relationships
validation: Build directed acyclic graph (DAG) from dependencies
features: Parse depends_on arrays for each step
Detect cycles using DFS (fail if circular dependencies found)
Topological sort to determine execution order
Group steps that can run in parallel (same dependency level)

acceptance_criteria: Correctly identifies parallel groups in security-audit.yaml (steps 2a, 2b, 2c)
Detects circular dependencies and fails gracefully
Outputs execution groups in correct order
Handles workflows with no dependencies (all sequential)
Includes unit tests with sample dependency graphs
